item.title: 康菲石油接近向飞轮能源出售 13 亿美元资产
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，康菲石油公司正在就以约 13 亿美元的价格将其在俄克拉荷马州的部分资产出售给持股紧密的 Flywheel Energy LLC 公司进行深入谈判，以精简其资产组合。【原文：ConocoPhillips is in advanced talks to sell some of its Oklahoma assets to closely held Flywheel Energy LLC for around $1.3 billion, as it streamlines its portfolio, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 巴拉圭将关键利率维持在 6%，此前上调了 CPI 和经济增长展望
item.description: 巴拉圭央行在上调通胀和经济增长前景一周后，将基准利率维持在 6% 不变。【原文：Paraguay’s central bank held its benchmark interest rate unchanged at 6% a week after it raised its outlook for inflation and economic growth.】

item.title: 微软裁员后为部分销售人员提供额外薪酬
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）刚刚进行了一轮影响其销售人员的裁员，正在为一些幸存者提供奖金。【原文：Microsoft Corp., fresh off a round of layoffs impacting its salespeople, is offering bonuses to some survivors.】

item.title: SharePoint黑客攻击事件引发微软网络改革热潮
item.description: 三个月前，微软公司发布了一份被称为史上最大网络安全工程项目的进展报告。【原文：Three months ago, Microsoft Corp. issued a progress report on what it described as the largest cybersecurity engineering project in history.】

item.title: SharePoint黑客攻击事件引发微软网络改革热潮
item.description: 2022年3月3日星期四，美国华盛顿州雷德蒙德微软园区外的标牌。最近几周，微软公司开始召集员工返回总部，但其重返办公室战略取决于混合工作方式。摄影师：Chona Kasinger/布隆伯格【原文：Signage outside the Microsoft Campus in Redmond, Washington, U.S., on Thursday, March 3, 2022. Microsoft Corp. has begun calling employees back to its headquarters in recent weeks, but its return-to-office strategy hinges on hybrid work. Photographer: Chona Kasinger/Bloomberg】

item.title: 波多黎各向赶走电网管理者 Luma Energy 迈出了一步
item.description: 波多黎各对负责管理该岛陷入困境的电网的美加财团 Luma Energy 发出通知，这被视为修改或毁约的第一步。【原文：Puerto Rico filed a notice against Luma Energy, the US-Canadian consortium that manages the island’s troubled power grid, in what is seen as an initial step toward modifying or breaking the contract.】

item.title: 遛狗应用 Wag！获准尝试快速退出破产程序
item.description: 遛狗服务公司 Wag！Group Co.赢得了法院许可，根据破产规则，该公司最早可在下个月削减债务，并将控制权移交给优先债权人 Retriever LLC。【原文：Dog walking service Wag! Group Co. won court permission to try to slash debt and hand control to senior creditor Retriever LLC as early as next month under bankruptcy rules that let companies speed through an insolvency case quicker-than-normal when they have the backing of creditors.】

item.title: Invenergy 将为其价值 110 亿美元的美国输电线增加天然气供应
item.description: 希望在美国中西部建设一条输电线的Invenergy公司是一家紧密控股的开发商，在面临共和党立法者因其与风能的关系而产生的反弹后，该公司正在将一家天然气厂与拟议中的价值110亿美元的美国输电项目相连接。【原文：Invenergy, the closely held developer that wants to build a power line in the US Midwest, is connecting a natural gas plant to its proposed $11 billion US transmission project after facing backlash from Republican lawmakers over ties to wind energy.】

item.title: 卡尼缓和贸易预期，称加拿大不会签署糟糕的协议
item.description: 加拿大总理试图为在未来十天内与美国达成贸易协议的期望降温，称谈判之所以困难，是因为特朗普政府不断改变其目标。【原文：Canada’s prime minister sought to cool expectations about reaching a trade agreement with the US in the next 10 days, saying the talks are difficult because the Trump administration keeps changing its goals.】

item.title: Anthelion 计划开展更多人工智能驱动的 CLO 和中间市场投资活动
item.description: 资产管理公司 Anthelion Capital 最近发行了第一笔抵押贷款债务，目前正计划每年发行约五笔此类债务，这也是该公司利用人工智能研究工具挑选各种资产和市场投资项目计划的一部分。【原文：Asset manager Anthelion Capital recently issued its first collateralized loan obligation and is now planning to issue around five of them per year, part of a plan to use artificial intelligence research tools to pick investments in a wide array of assets and markets.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉石油产量通过稀释剂狂潮抵御雪佛龙公司的退出
item.description: 自从美国迫使雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）关闭在委内瑞拉的业务以来，委内瑞拉的石油产量比预期的更有韧性。【原文：Venezuela’s oil output has been more resilient than expected since the US forced Chevron Corp. to wind down operations in the country, with a last-minute shopping spree for a key production supply helping cushion the blow.】

item.title: S&P Global 寻求合作，将其数据整合到人工智能工具中
item.description: S&P Global 公司正寻求扩大与人工智能公司的合作，以便向使用这些人工智能工具的客户提供其数据。【原文：S&P Global Inc. is looking to expand partnerships with artificial intelligence companies to make its data available to customers who use those AI tools.】

item.title: 亚马逊收购售价 50 美元的可穿戴人工智能个人助理制造商 Bee
item.description: 亚马逊公司正在收购一家生产价值 50 美元的可穿戴人工智能助手的初创公司 Bee。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is acquiring Bee, a startup that makes a $50 wearable AI assistant.】

item.title: 完全自主零售开发商 VenHub 计划直接上市
item.description: VenHub Global 公司计划在美国交易所直接上市，此前这家全自动零售商店开发商放弃了早先通过与一家空白支票公司合并上市的计划。【原文：VenHub Global Inc. plans to undertake a direct listing on a US exchange after the developer of fully automated retail stores abandoned an earlier plan to go public by merging with a blank-check firm.】

item.title: 随着科尔百货公司的飙升，"备忘录股票热 "正像 2021 年一样蔓延开来
item.description:
在 WallStreetBets 开启新交易时代四年后，散户投资者纷纷涌入 Opendoor 和 Kohl's 等被严重做空的公司。【原文：

Four years after WallStreetBets ushered in a new trading era, retail investors are piling into heavily shorted companies like Opendoor and Kohl’s. 

】

item.title: 为特朗普关税买单的是美国人，而不是外国公司
item.description: 谁在为唐纳德-特朗普的关税买单？到目前为止，是美国企业和消费者。【原文：Who’s paying for Donald Trump’s tariffs? So far, American businesses and consumers.】

item.title: Synovus 在引起收购兴趣后考虑潜在合并事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国东南部地区银行 Synovus Financial Corp.正在权衡包括潜在合并在内的各种方案。【原文：Synovus Financial Corp., a regional bank in the southeastern US, is weighing options including a potential merger after drawing interest, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 铂金市场的 "深度 "紧缺几乎没有缓解的迹象
item.description: 在过去几天里，由于关税担忧和投机性买盘将铂金从伦敦和苏黎世的主要市场拉入美国和中国的仓库，铂金市场已紧缩到前所未有的水平。【原文：The platinum market has tightened to unprecedented levels in the past few days as tariff fears and speculative buying pull metal from the key London and Zurich markets into warehouses in the US and China.】

item.title: 被关闭的纽约学院校园出售将为债券持有人带来 50% 的回收率
item.description: 纽约州北部的一个当地居民团体正计划以 950 万美元的价格购买关闭的卡泽诺维亚学院校园；据估计，这笔钱加上其他资金，可为债券持有人带来略高于 50%的回收率。【原文：A group of local residents in upstate New York is planning to buy the shuttered Cazenovia College campus for $9.5 million — a sum that, when combined with other funds, is estimated to give bondholders a recovery rate of just over 50%.】

item.title: 西班牙大停电后阻止电力系统采取关键措施
item.description: 西班牙议会阻止了政府在 4 月全国大停电后批准的一套关键规则。【原文：Spain’s Parliament blocked a set of key rules approved by the government following the nationwide blackout in April.】

item.title: 稀土矿商 Aclara 寻求国家资助美国-巴西计划
item.description: Aclara Resources Inc. 正在与美国政府机构洽谈融资事宜，计划出资 15 亿美元在拉丁美洲开采稀土，并在美国开发加工设施。【原文：Aclara Resources Inc. is in talks with US government agencies for possible financing toward its $1.5 billion plan to mine rare earths in Latin America and develop processing facilities in the US.】

item.title: 英国陷入困境的 Prax Lindsey 工厂将停止炼油
item.description: 能源部长迈克尔-尚克斯（Michael Shanks）周二告诉立法者，英格兰北部的林赛炼油厂将不会继续经营下去。【原文：The Lindsey oil refinery in northern England won’t continue as a going concern, Energy Minister Michael Shanks told lawmakers Tuesday.】

item.title: 比索收益率飙升，阿根廷银行面临流动性紧缩问题
item.description: 阿根廷比索纸币的利率全面飙升，在政府努力捍卫本币导致流动性紧缩的情况下，给银行带来了巨大压力。【原文：Interest rates on Argentine peso notes are soaring across the board, piling pressure on banks amid a liquidity crunch caused by government efforts to defend the local currency.】

item.title: GrabAGun 股价暴跌，原因是小特朗普的推销失败
item.description: 即使在小唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump Jr.）盛赞这家在线枪支零售商之后，GrabAGun Digital Holdings Inc. 的股价自上市以来仍一路下滑。【原文：Shares of GrabAGun Digital Holdings Inc. have slumped since their public debut even after Donald Trump Jr. extolled the online firearms retailer.】

item.title: 戴尔运营总裁接管个人电脑部门应对需求低迷
item.description: 在个人电脑业务长期低迷的情况下，戴尔科技公司对部分领导层进行了重组，让首席运营官杰夫-克拉克（Jeff Clarke）直接负责个人电脑部门。【原文：Dell Technologies Inc. has reorganized some of its leadership, putting Chief Operating Officer Jeff Clarke directly in charge of its personal computer unit amid a prolonged slump in that business.】

item.title: ASM 第二季度订单因高级逻辑预订而减少
item.description: ASM International NV 第二季度订单不及预期，原因是其先进逻辑/铸造业务部门的预订量减少。【原文：ASM International NV’s second-quarter orders missed expectations due to lower bookings from its advanced logic/foundry business segment.】

item.title: 诺基亚以美元疲软和关税为由下调盈利预测
item.description: 诺基亚公司（Nokia Oyj）表示，以美元疲软和关税为由，下调了今年的利润指导。【原文：Nokia Oyj said it cut its profit guidance for the year, citing a weaker US dollar and tariffs.】

item.title: 波多黎各委员会对 Fortress 液化天然气新交易深表关切
item.description: 波多黎各联邦监察机构重申对一份合同的深切关注，该合同将使新堡垒能源公司在十多年的时间里几乎完全控制该岛的液化天然气输送，并表示它对该交易是如何达成的存在严重疑问。【原文：Puerto Rico’s federal watchdog reiterated deep concerns about a contract that would give New Fortress Energy almost complete control of the island’s liquefied natural gas deliveries for more than a decade, and said it has serious questions about how the deal was hammered out.】

item.title: 满载铜的船只在特朗普征收 50%关税前争先恐后抵达美国
item.description: 至少有四艘运铜船正试图在八月前抵达美国港口，以抢在计划对金属征收进口关税之前抵达。【原文：At least four ships carrying copper are trying to reach US ports before August to get ahead of planned import tariffs on the metal.】

item.title: 意大利将对裕信银行竞购 BPM 重新施加大部分条件
item.description: 意大利正在制定一项新法令，准备对意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）计划对 Banco BPM SpA 的收购重新施加大部分条件，这凸显了罗马对收购的持续抵制。【原文：Italy is working on a new decree which is set to reimpose most of its conditions for UniCredit SpA’s planned takeover of Banco BPM SpA, underscoring Rome’s continued resistance to the bid.】
